item.title: Cycle Lane blocked, 9th October
item.description:
The cycle lane adjacent to 687-691 High Road, North Finchley is too wide for purpose. I regularly commute at 6.30 am when it is still dark and the cycle lane is wide enough for cars to park in them disrupting the view when turning right from Rosemont Avenue. There is no need for the cycle lanes to be as wide, and they should be reduced to the normal width before an accident happens. Cars parked illegally in that area should also be given a traffic parking ticket.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Road, North Finchley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car for sale, 9th October
item.description:

item.category: Vehicles for sale on the public road

item.title: Grass Cutting not on maintenance programm, 9th October
item.description:
The main area of Grassmeade Recreation ground does not appear to be on any maintenance schedule. The children's play area is cut fairly regularly but the grass in field isn't. Hedges have been trimmed but no grass cut for 6 months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanton Close, Poverest, London
